ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result);
let bookList = [];
if (res.search_tabs) {
    for (let i = 0; i < res.search_tabs.length; i++) {
        let books = res["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
        bookList = bookList.concat(books);        
    }
} else { bookList = res.data; }
r=JSON.stringify(bookList);
</js>$..video_data[*]||[*]
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
id=`{{$.series_id}}`
if(id){
	var url=`{{i()}}/detail?book_id=${id}`
	}else{
		var url=`{{i()}}/API/playlet/?book_id={{$.book_id}}`
		}
		url
</js>
ruleSearch.kind:
<js>
var original = result.category_schema;
var output = '';
if (original === undefined || original === null) {
  original = '';
}
try {
  var parsed = JSON.parse(original);
  if (Array.isArray(parsed)) {
    var names = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < parsed.length; i++) {
      var item = parsed[i];
      if (item && typeof item.name === 'string') {
        names.push(item.name);
      }
    }
    output = names.join(',');
  } else {
    output = String(original).replace(/„ÄÅ/g, ',');
  }
} catch (e) {
  output = String(original).replace(/„ÄÅ/g, ',');
}
var score=`{{$.score}}`

if(score){
	var score =score+"ÂàÜ";
	}
	
output+","+score;
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.title##||„Ää|„Äã
